verses.verse: Stand firm <WG4739> therefore <WG3767> in the liberty <WG1657> by which <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> has made <WG1659> us <WG2248> free, <WG1659> and <WG2532> don't <WG3361> be <WG1758> entangled <WG1758> again <WG3825> with a yoke <WG2218> of bondage. <WG1397>

Yes, <WG1161> I testify <WG3143> again <WG3825> to every <WG3956> man <WG444> who receives circumcision, <WG4059> that <WG3754> he is <WG2076> a debtor <WG3781> to do <WG4160> the <WG3551> whole <WG3650> law. <WG3551>

For <WG1063> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> neither <WG3777> circumcision <WG4061> amounts <WG2480> to anything, <WG5100> nor <WG3777> uncircumcision, <WG203> but <WG235> faith <WG4102> working <WG1754> through <WG1223> love. <WG26>
You were running <WG5143> well! <WG2573> Who <WG5101> interfered <WG348> with you <WG5209> that you should <WG3982> not <WG3361> obey <WG3982> the truth? <WG1465>
This <WG3588> persuasion <WG3988> is not <WG3756> from <WG1537> him who <WG3588> calls <WG2564> you. <WG5209>
A little <WG3398> yeast <WG2219> grows through <WG2220> the <WG5445> whole <WG3650> lump. <WG5445>

I <WG1473> have confidence <WG3982> toward <WG1519> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> that <WG3754> you will <WG5426> think <WG5426> no <WG3762> other <WG243> way. <WG1161> But he who <WG3588> troubles <WG5015> you <WG5209> will bear <WG941> his <WG3588> judgment, <WG3748> whoever <WG302> he is. <WG5600>

But <WG1161> I, <WG1473> brothers, <WG80> if <WG1487> I <WG2784> still <WG2089> preach <WG2784> circumcision, <WG4061> why <WG5101> am I <WG1377> still <WG2089> persecuted? <WG1377> Then <WG686> the stumbling <WG4625> block of the cross <WG4716> has <WG2673> been removed. <WG2673>
I wish <WG3785> that those who <WG3588> disturb <WG387> you <WG5209> would <WG3785> cut themselves <WG2532> off. <WG609>

For <WG1063> you, <WG5210> brothers, <WG80> were called <WG2564> for <WG1063> freedom. <WG1657> Only <WG3440> don't <WG3361> use your freedom <WG1657> for <WG1519> gain <WG874> to the flesh, <WG4561> but <WG235> through <WG1223> love <WG26> be servants <WG1398> to one another. <WG240>

For <WG1063> the whole <WG3956> law <WG3551> is fulfilled <WG4137> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> word, <WG3056> in <WG1722> this: <WG3588> "You shall love <WG25> your <WG4675> neighbor <WG4139> as <WG5613> yourself. <WG1438>"
But <WG1161> if <WG1487> you bite <WG1143> and <WG2532> devour <WG2719> one another, <WG240> be careful <WG991> that you <WG355> don't <WG3361> consume <WG355> one <WG240> <WG5259> another. <WG240>
But I say, <WG3004> <WG1161> walk <WG4043> by the Spirit, <WG4151> and <WG2532> you <WG5055> won't <WG3756> <WG3361> fulfill <WG5055> the lust <WG1939> of the flesh. <WG4561>

idolatry, <WG1495> sorcery, <WG5331> hatred, <WG2189> strife, <WG2052> jealousies, <WG2205> outbursts of anger, <WG2372> rivalries, <WG2052> divisions, <WG1370> heresies, <WG139>

gentleness, <WG4236> and self-control. <WG1466> Against <WG2596> such <WG5108> things there is <WG2076> no <WG3756> law. <WG3551>
Those <WG1161> who belong <WG3588> to Christ <WG5547> have crucified <WG4717> the flesh <WG4561> with <WG4862> its passions <WG3804> and <WG2532> lusts. <WG1939>
